name: Find The Word Connection #1 Trivia Quiz | Mixed 25 Questions | 25 Questions

questions.text: 1) The colour of the ball in snooker that is worth two points. 2) The second longest river in China?

1) The larger variety of corgi. 2) A knitted sweater with buttons up the front?

questions.explanation:
Webb & webb & Web & web.

	1) Captain Matthew Webb. 2) Harry Webb

questions.text: 1) American inventor of the safety lift. 2) Singer who had a British hit with (Sitting On) The Dock OF The Bay?

Otis & otis.

questions.text: 1) The chief administrative official of a college or university. 2) Moody young American actor who starred in 'East of Eden', 'Giant' and 'Rebel Without A Cause'?

fahrenheit & farenheit & fahrenhite.
